name: Real Simulator DJ
description:
Real Simulator DJ - this simulation game where you can play on your phone as instruments to DJ music! Do you love club music? Do you want to try yourself as a DJ? You have a chance with our app!
Write your own music! Do the disco at home!
Show your friends your console to DJ! Let them think that you are able to reduce the tracks! Make your music, pleasantly surprising your friends!
Mix of different tracks!
Make fun and play your friends and loved ones!
Thank you for playing our applications! Leave us feedback and we try to make our games even more interesting!
